. C ¢
“THE TOBACCO INSTITUTE, 1xc ihe cee

{770K STRCET, NORTHWEST | WASHINGTON, D.C, 20006 | 202/296.434 President

February 1, 1977

MEMORANDUM

Committee of Counsel
Executive Committee

 

FROM: Horace R. Kornegay

Attached for your information is br. Waite's analysis
of the personnel of the National Commission on Smoking
and Public Policy set up by the American Cancer Society
and announced at a Waldorf-Astoria news conference at
noon today, a copy of the press release and an article
from the San Francisco Chronicle, dated December 9, 1975.

The Institute has prepared a statement pertinent to the
Cancer Society's new conference which will be released to
any and all media contacting us. A copy of our statement
is also attached.

HARRY

Attachments

6956080249

summary: The Institute has prepared a statement pertinent to the American Cancer Society's new conference which will be released to all media contacting us. A copy of the press release and an article from the San Francisco Chronicle, dated December 9, 1975, is also attached. The Institute is a private, non-profit organization based in Washington, D.C.
